abstract: Jim Gilmore, who has qualified for the so-called undercard debate on Thursday, the first debate that he’s qualified for since August, said: “I should be the president of the United States, I’m going to be the president of the United States.”

headline.main: Verbatim: Jim Gilmore Remains Confident He Will Be President

snippet: Jim Gilmore, who has qualified for the so-called undercard debate on Thursday, the first debate that he’s qualified for since August, said: “I should be the president of the United States, I’m going to be the president of the United States.”
